title: White Lies
description: USA Today bestselling author Autumn Jones Lake invites you to the most anticipated wedding of the Lost Kings MC.The most dangerous lies are the ones we tell ourselves.MC life is full of lies and half-truths.Our world demands secrecy. Except from each other. Brotherhood requires honor, loyalty, and respect.I owe everything I am to the Lost Kings MC. I’ll protect my brothers with my life, and they’ll do the same for me.Sometimes we lie to protect the ones we love the most.Nothing worth having is ever a smooth ride.Why hurt each other with ugly truths when pretty lies provide so much comfort?But what if a few white lies cost us everything?After all, half the truth is still a lie.
author: Autumn Jones Lake
